snippet: The Municipal Labor Committee, a coalition of unions, obtained a temporary restraining order stopping the Bloomberg administration from seeking new coverage.
abstract: Municipal Labor Committee, coalition of unions that negotiates with New York City on health benefits, files complaint against city and obtains temporary restraining order stopping Bloomberg administration from seeking cheaper coverage for city employees; coalition charges that city has been hasty and has left it out of process.
lead_paragraph: The Municipal Labor Committee, a coalition of unions, obtained a temporary restraining order stopping the Bloomberg administration from seeking new coverage.

headline.main: Public Unions Fight New York’s Effort to Curb Health Costs
headline.print_headline: Unions Fight Effort to Curb Health Costs

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
